extensionAttribute.description: Checks the installed version of Java

input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Checks the installed version of Java if [[ `/usr/bin/find /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines -name "*.jdk" 2> /dev/null` || `/usr/bin/find /System/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines -name "*.jdk" 2> /dev/null` ]] then result=`/usr/bin/java -version 2>&1 | grep "java" | awk '{ print substr($3, 2, length($3)-2); }'` else result="not_installed" fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
